name: StarBoy (itch) (Rarira)
description:
You're an astronaut trying to survive on the moon but it's raining asteroids. Your goal is to avoid or shoot the asteroids while trying to collect the stars. This game isn't fully finished yet.

LIVES  = 5

STAR = 5 points

MISSING A STAR = -10 points

CONTROLS (instructions in game):

MOVE - Mouse

JUMP - Right Mouse Click / Spacebar

SHOOT - Left Mouse Click
